snippet.title: The Castle Mystery | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist The Castle Mystery on Steam now!

A first-person horror game where you step into the shoes of a historian who receives a tempting invitation to explore a long-abandoned castle. Drawn by the promise of a generous reward, you accept the offer without hesitation. 

#indiegame #indiegames
